description:
The scene presents a woman seated in a softly lit room with pale-colored walls. She is captured from the shoulders up, and her posture is slightly hunched as she looks downward, perhaps at something in her hands or lap that isnâ€™t visible. Her dark hair is cut in a neat, straight style just above her shoulders. She wears a gray cardigan over a black top, giving her a simple and understated appearance.

Her expression seems contemplative or subdued, with her gaze directed downwards, suggesting introspection.
